credit_line: Gift of the Pennsylvania Railroad through Samuel M. Vauclain
title: Final Tissue for Creation of Illustration of Streamline K4s Locomotive, Pennsylvania Railroad
medium: Graphite, yellow crayon on tracing paper
description: A final tissue for K-4 class locomotive, a streamlined train.    A locomotive, in the form of a bullet (engine number 5400) is depicted as approaching diagonally from right distance to left foreground on the center of three tracks.
name: Drawing
